game.title: FRU
game.description:
FRU is a puzzle platformer that features an innovative use of Kinect, in which your silhouette becomes a "portal" between two worlds.

You will find yourself solving puzzles by strategically positioning your body, combining physical interaction with traditional platforming.

The game features four completely different chapters, all based around our innovative use of the silhouette, with a unique twist to each one of them.

In addition to moving and balancing your body to solve levels, you’ll also find yourself swimming inside your silhouette, striking crazy poses to activate contraptions, and awkwardly tiptoeing to avoid dangerous hazards!
game.history:
FRU was born as a quick prototype realised in 48 hours during the 2014 Global Game Jam in Breda, Netherlands. Desperate for the lack of ideas and the sleep deprivation, we discovered our programmer had brought a Kinect.

Ideas flew, one prototype lead to another, and we finally had a game, which you can see in our very old trailer: youtube link

We were blown away by the response of critic and public, so we decided to turn the game into a more complete and polished experience. We founded "Through Games", the company that we have been part of for the more than two years of development.

After a brief stop at E3, showcasing our coop prototype ( youtube link ), we decided we were going to focus on single player, but included the cooperative version in the full game as an unlockable bonus.

The new FRU is an entirely revised experience, with new mechanics and worlds, including a Water world (We promise, it's the *good* kind of water level!) where you can Swim inside your silhouette, and a "silhouette-buttons" mechanic that will rival the Yoga teacher your cousin is talking so much about.

features.feature: Innovative, never seen before use of Kinect
Four different chapters, with completely unique ways of using the main mechanic
110 Levels there to prove that, and 24 Extra Collectibles as if the game wasn't challenging enough!
Our original E3 2014 Co-op Build ready to be unlocked!
Achievements that ask you to move muscles you didn't even know you had!
